about.title: About {schoolName}
about.description: Established in {established}, {schoolName} stands as a beacon of excellence in education. We are committed to providing quality education and holistic development to our students.

academicExcellence.title: Academic Excellence
academicExcellence.description: Commitment to providing the highest quality education and fostering intellectual growth.

holisticDevelopment.title: Holistic Development
holisticDevelopment.description: Nurturing physical, emotional, social, and spiritual development alongside academics.

culturalIntegration.title: Cultural Integration
culturalIntegration.description: Celebrating diversity and promoting cultural understanding and global citizenship.

characterBuilding.title: Character Building
characterBuilding.description: Instilling values of integrity, discipline, and social responsibility.

establishment.description: Jankalyan Nivasi Vidyalay, Latur was established on December 5th, 1993 as a residential school.

ssc.description: School got affiliated with Maharashtra State Board of Secondary and Higher Secondary Education.

expansion.description: New buildings and modern facilities were added to the campus.

digitalLearning.description: Introduction of smart classrooms and digital learning resources.

excellenceRecognition.description: Awarded "Best Navodaya Vidyalaya" at state level for outstanding performance.

primaryToSecondary.title: Primary to Secondary Level
primaryToSecondary.description: Structured learning approach from foundation to advanced levels. Focus on basic concepts, language development, and skill building with emphasis on conceptual understanding, progressing to comprehensive SSC Board curriculum with board examination preparation and career guidance.

marathiSemiEnglish.title: Marathi & Semi-English Medium
marathiSemiEnglish.description: Education offered in Marathi and semi-English medium to cater to diverse learning needs.

smartClassrooms.title: Smart Classrooms
smartClassrooms.description: Technology-enabled learning environment with digital boards and interactive content.

projectBasedLearning.title: Project-Based Learning
projectBasedLearning.description: Hands-on approach to understanding concepts through practical application.

continuousAssessment.title: Continuous Assessment
continuousAssessment.description: Regular evaluation and feedback system for holistic development tracking.

sciences.title: Sciences
sciences.description: Physics, Chemistry, Biology with well-equipped practical laboratories.

mathematics.title: Mathematics
mathematics.description: Advanced mathematics with problem-solving focus and analytical thinking.

languages.title: Languages
languages.description: English, Hindi, Marathi, and Sanskrit for cultural and linguistic development.

socialStudies.title: Social Studies
socialStudies.description: History, Geography, Political Science, and Economics for social awareness.

computerScience.title: Computer Science
computerScience.description: Programming and software development with modern technology and programming languages.

academicBlocks.title: Academic Blocks
academicBlocks.description: Modern classrooms with smart boards, audio-visual equipment, and comfortable seating arrangements.

laboratories.title: Laboratories
laboratories.description: Well-equipped science and computer laboratories for practical learning and research.

centralLibrary.title: Central Library
centralLibrary.description: Extensive collection of books, journals, and digital resources for comprehensive learning.

sportsComplex.title: Sports Complex
sportsComplex.description: Comprehensive sports facilities for physical fitness and competitive sports training.

accommodation.title: Accommodation
accommodation.description: Comfortable dormitory-style rooms with modern amenities.

safetySecurity.title: Safety & Security
safetySecurity.description: 24/7 security and supervision for student safety.

recreation.title: Recreation
recreation.description: Indoor and outdoor recreational facilities for leisure time.

healthCare.title: Health Care
healthCare.description: Medical facilities and health monitoring for student wellbeing.

onlineRegistration.title: Online Registration
onlineRegistration.description: Complete the online application form at the official JNV portal. Registration opens on January 15, 2024.

entranceTest.title: Entrance Test
entranceTest.description: Jankalyan Nivasi Vidyalay Selection Test (JNVST) for Class V admission. Test date: April 20, 2024.

meritList.title: Merit List
meritList.description: Merit list will be published based on test performance. Results announced by May 30, 2024.

documentVerification.title: Document Verification
documentVerification.description: Selected candidates must complete document verification and fee payment by June 15, 2024.

classV.qualification: Passed Class IV from recognized school

classVI.qualification: Passed Class V from recognized school

sportsComplex.title: Sports Complex
sportsComplex.description: Modern sports facilities including football ground, basketball court, and athletics track.

culturalPerformance.title: Cultural Performance
culturalPerformance.description: Students performing traditional dance during annual cultural festival.

hostelFacilities.title: Hostel Facilities
hostelFacilities.description: Clean and comfortable dormitory rooms with study areas.

scienceExhibition.title: Science Exhibition
scienceExhibition.description: Students showcasing innovative science projects and experiments.

annualSportsMeet.title: Annual Sports Meet
annualSportsMeet.description: Inter-house athletics competition with students participating in various events.

independenceDayCelebration.title: Independence Day Celebration
independenceDayCelebration.description: Flag hoisting ceremony and patriotic cultural programs.

computerLaboratory.title: Computer Laboratory
computerLaboratory.description: Modern computer lab with latest hardware and software for student learning.

scheduleDescriptions.wakeUpBell: Morning wake-up call for all students
scheduleDescriptions.breakfast: Nutritious morning meal in mess hall
scheduleDescriptions.dinner: Evening meal with variety of dishes

comfortableAccommodation.title: Comfortable Accommodation
comfortableAccommodation.description: Well-ventilated dormitories with 4-6 students per room, equipped with individual study tables, storage lockers, and comfortable beds.
features: Separate rooms for boys and girls

nutritiousMessFacilities.title: Nutritious Mess Facilities
nutritiousMessFacilities.description: Hygienic kitchen and dining hall serving balanced vegetarian meals prepared by experienced cooks with focus on nutrition.

safetySecurity.title: Safety & Security
safetySecurity.description: 24/7 security arrangements with trained wardens and support staff ensuring complete safety of all resident students.

healthWellness.title: Health & Wellness
healthWellness.description: Regular health check-ups, emergency medical services, and mental health support.

interHouseSportsCompetition2024.title: Inter-House Sports Competition 2024
interHouseSportsCompetition2024.description: Annual inter-house sports competition begins with swimming and athletics events. All four houses competing for the championship trophy.

digitalLibraryInauguration.title: Digital Library Inauguration
digitalLibraryInauguration.description: State-of-the-art digital library with 10,000+ e-books and online resources inaugurated by Education Minister.

nationalScienceDayCelebration.title: National Science Day Celebration
nationalScienceDayCelebration.description: Special programs and exhibitions planned for National Science Day. Guest lecture by renowned scientist Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam Institute.

studentExchangeProgram.title: Student Exchange Program
studentExchangeProgram.description: Cultural exchange program with sister school in Japan. Selected students will participate in 2-week educational tour.

annualDayPreparation.title: Annual Day Preparation
annualDayPreparation.description: Students busy with preparations for Annual Day celebration. Cultural programs, drama, and musical performances planned.

codeOfConduct.title: Code of Conduct
codeOfConduct.description: Students must maintain respectful behavior towards teachers, staff, and fellow students at all times.
details: Respectful communication with all members of the school community
No use of abusive language or inappropriate behavior
Proper etiquette during meals, study hours, and recreational activities
Maintaining dignity of the institution in all interactions

attendanceRequirements.title: Attendance Requirements
attendanceRequirements.description: Regular attendance is mandatory for all academic and co-curricular activities.
details: Minimum 75% attendance required for internal assessment
Medical certificates required for extended absences
Prior permission needed for planned leave
Punctuality expected for all classes and activities

uniformAndGrooming.title: Uniform and Grooming
uniformAndGrooming.description: Proper uniform and grooming standards must be maintained as per school guidelines.
details: Complete school uniform to be worn during school hours
Neat and clean appearance with proper grooming
No unauthorized accessories or modifications to uniform
Specific dress code for different activities and events

academicIntegrity.title: Academic Integrity
academicIntegrity.description: Students must maintain honesty and integrity in all academic work and examinations.
details: No cheating, plagiarism, or academic dishonesty
Original work submission for all assignments
Proper citation and acknowledgment of sources
Fair play in competitions and assessments

schoolProspectus202425.title: School Prospectus 2024-25
schoolProspectus202425.description: Comprehensive guide about JNV Latur including admission procedures, academics, and facilities.

academicCalendar202425.title: Academic Calendar 2024-25
academicCalendar202425.description: Complete academic year schedule including holidays, examinations, and important events.

feeStructure.title: Fee Structure
feeStructure.description: Detailed breakdown of all fees including hostel, mess, and other charges.

admissionApplicationForm.title: Admission Application Form
admissionApplicationForm.description: Printable application form for Class VI and lateral entry admissions.

syllabusClassVIToVIII.description: Comprehensive syllabus for foundation level classes with subject-wise breakdown.

syllabusClassVToX.description: Complete academic year syllabus with SSC Board curriculum.
